website_summaries.verdict: Between its stunning video and photo quality and incredibly easy-to-use design, the GoPro HERO5 is clearly the best body camera out there.
cons: Some users report that water can get into the camera

website_summaries.verdict: Combining everything great about the Hero4 cameras and then some, the GoPro Hero5 Black is a no-compromise capture device for the ordinary and extraordinary.
pros: The GoPro Hero5 Black is a true flagship camera with all the shooting options from its predecessor plus raw and wide dynamic range photo capture and linear field of view video, a touchscreen, a waterproof body, GPS, electronic image stabilization, stereo audio, voice control, the option for auto cloud uploads, and the best photo and video quality in a GoPro
cons: Battery life, especially with GPS, Wi-Fi and EIS on, is predictably short and the camera is not compatible with older batteries
Auto upload feature only works with GoPro's $5/month Plus service
Linear field of view and electronic image stabilization not available at all resolutions and frame rates

customer_reviews.title: ... I was worried because there were quite a few bad reviews. I should have listened to the bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my first GoPro - very exited even though I was worried because there were quite a few bad reviews. I should have listened to the bad reviews. Right out of the box the display on the back of the camera did not work. Tried the updates, bought the best SD Card off the company website. Tried several batteries. Tried with camera directly powered by computer. Nothing worked. Sending it back for a refund. When something has 25 percent 2 star or less ratings, and most of the three star ratings mention numerous problems, I should listen. Lesson learned the hard way. DONT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap.  Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Wouldn't turn on nor charge straight out of the box. Couldn't get a hold of Go Pro customer service by chat or by phone. I'm not wasting anymore time on this and returning it!!! Google "Go Pro 5 black won't turn on" and you'll see there is a huge problem with these things. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: spazzysteph

customer_reviews.title: Ask for replacement, if its acting up the same I need refund.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this gopro and use for my trip but it hangup many times, the video turn black, and no function is working. I need to remove the battery to make it work again. Ask for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ina Macaspak

customer_reviews.title: Awful product dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for my trip to puerto vallarta, first use i took it in the pool, I was under the impression it was water proof, basically stoped working in first day of trip very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: gilberto preciado

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, it's a mini brick.
customer_reviews.text: This cameras screen was black the entire time I had it (4days) it only turned on twice for me. When it was on it wouldn't record longer than 14 seconds before it would freeze and become unresponsive. The battery died so fast. When I thought the camera was turned off it was actually on with a black screen and draining the battery. I'll just keep using my session.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Terribly designed lens cap admits water which of course leads ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful "waterproof" design. Terribly designed lens cap admits water which of course leads to immediate fogging. Why anyone thought this would be a good idea eludes me. This lens cap is also mounted by a crappy cheap plastic locking mechanism that shows signs of major wear after light use. If you intend to use this camera in the water, look elsewhere or be prepared to be constantly removing and defogging the lens. To make matters worse it comes with no instructions and the online "help" is confusing and contradictory.
customer_reviews.author: Garbo Hermit

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUYING ANYTHING FROM GOPRO AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Have to take them damn thing apart half the time to JUST TO GET IT TO TURN ON (see youtube -- there are tons of angry customers who have this problem). No applications available for your computer or laptop (MAC or PC) to live stream to -- you have to use a tablet or phone via wireless. If you like the idea of messing with your camera (removing battery, SSD card) and fumbling with it for several minutes just to get it to turn on, by all means keep giving this stupid company your money. THEIR SUPPORT IS WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grill TX

customer_reviews.title: Issues with playback forced a return. No matter what services or players I used, we could not get the video to play correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money or hassle. Could not for the life of me figure out the playback on any of the video. No matter what settings or players I downloaded, I could not get the video to stop lagging. Went through two highly capable computers that worked wonderfully with my HERO 3 in 1080 recording. For some reason even at potato quality, this thing would lag the entire video. Spoke back and forth with them on this issue with no results after trying several different options. Ended up just sending it back and went with an actual dash cam..something the HERO 3 did perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: guess there's a first for everything...
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is a first. Bought a camera with no battery and no charger. It doesn't even look like a gopro. Came in a box that has the words "GoPro" on it, looks nothing like the pictures shown. With a bit more research, turns out it's a waterproof camera. I bought a NEW GOPRO HERO 5, NOT Random Camera in a "GoPro" box. Returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Its JUNK
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses in 1 year, then the seals fail in a few meters of water. A product designed to fail. Its not water proof and not worth the money. I expected an item that would last at least 5 years. Useless for taking pictures, and uses up the battery in 30 min taking simple pictures. Voice command also does not work. You have to scream like an idiot for it to work. Software also is very hard to use, with no instructions or steps on how to make it work. (and yes, I have been diving for 30 years and take care of the seals)
customer_reviews.author: D. Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to open
customer_reviews.text: As an older consumer with arthritis this camera is virtually impossible to extract from its housing. That coupled with an instruction manual where the font is so small it is unreadable, makes this device unfit for use. My brother keeps telling me to hang in there, and to look the instructions up on line (he can’t read them either), unsure whether I will. We go to Africa every year and I wanted this for its video capability. If I can’t open it to put the memory card in, it is useless
customer_reviews.author: mamasherrom

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought the GoPro, charged it all night. Ordered additional accessories and SD card and was hyped to use it. Then I turned it on, or I should say I attempted to turn it on. Battery does not charge. Camera will turn on when connected through USB-C but unplug it and it shuts down. Sad thing is that now I can’t use it for Christmas or New Years. Spoke to a go pro rep and they are going to send me a replacement battery, unfortunately it won’t arrive anytime soon. 1 star for now due to the product not working, I sure hope this is not an indication of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: becomes very hot instantly
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it outdoors yet because it became very hot after only a couple of minutes being turned on. Will update my review as soon as I get to use it properly. I was afraid the battery would explode so I shut it off. UPDATE1: I charged it later in the day and took a few photos. Some of the photos turned out blurry, but overall the camera seems to be working fine for now. The fact that it becomes hot still is very concerning because if it gets as hot as 60 degrees Celsius it will certainly explode. For the price of 350$ I think the camera quality is acceptable, but I wouldn't be willing to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Some User

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: When i first used it, the screen was black. I forgot how i made it work. I think it was after changing the battery. Recently, on my 3rd use, the screen got black again and u cant make it work
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Turns on and off on its own, kills battery.
customer_reviews.text: This device keeps turning on and off repeatedly. Bought one, and GoPro suggested I return it to Amazon, so I did. Secons came, and does the same thing. Contacted GoPro again and they said they would replace the camera. I have not received the camera directly from GoPro yet, will update later. However, based on my experience so far...do not buy this camera. Nothing but frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. It went with us 1,500 ft up on the mountain in the above 100 degrees F weather and deep into the sea waters. I am so glad that we bought it before our vacation. Photos are so beautiful and help us remember and revive our past adventurous traveling far away. This is a must have for everyone who wants to see places you ventured to and faces you might never see again or will be changed with time. It worked well and the only thing I could change is the battery life but nothing is perfect. We bought a charger that was used extensively and was a life saver for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mia A

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased first time, then water went in the lens by the pool. Had to return it, they send me a new one!, Not functional again, does not turn on, probably battery doesn't charge or don't work, but still don't want to buy another gopro again!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Fernández

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as expected!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased GoPro thinking it would be the smart decision with 2 small children now in the mix. Unfortunately this is the 3rd one that I've had this year, and it just broke falling from a low coffee while filming our baby. Any other camera you would just find a repair shop, but GoPro don't have these. Unfortunately, GoPro just want you to purchase another one at a discount every time there is an issue. To keep your customers buying more and more is a great strategy, but unfortunately at the expense of your customers. I certainly will not by a 4th one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B Durda

customer_reviews.title: Beware of front LED water leak
customer_reviews.text: Water leaked in Fron LED display. Only had it about 5 feet deep in a pool. Lasted about a year before water leaked into the front display. GoPro support only offered 40% off a new camera. I did buy a warranty with SquareTrade. I will be using that to hopefully replace the camera.
customer_reviews.author: MaziMaz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. IT'S NOT WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, do NOT buy this product. It's not waterproof as they say. Bought it as christmas gift for myself, and the first time i get to use it underwater, it gets completely filled. Also, i've been trying to contact customer support regarding this issue and no one seems to pick up the phone. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Lamarche

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: Failed out of box. but don't just take my word for it... Google "defective hero 5" . Search on YouTube "hero 5 problems"... Hero 5 is junk.... RETURNED... But I Still love my hero 4 silver
customer_reviews.author: Pookie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great features when comparing the 5 Black to the 7 White
customer_reviews.text: I was evaluating between getting the GoPro 7 white or the GoPro 5 Black which can be gotten for about the same price. Comparing the features between the budget 7 white and the older Go Pro 5 black the 5 has more features. The 5 doesn't have the upgraded image stabilization that the 7 offers, but the the clincher for me to go with the 5 Black was the removable battery. The 5 white has an internal battery so your video options are limited to a little over an hour of video before having to recharge. Even now with 2 generations of GoPros out since the 5, the 5 still holds up as a great action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Oates

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera Bad Company
customer_reviews.text: First, this is an amazing camera. It shoots so well. Great settings and beautiful quality. You can create any shot you want with this thing. It has so many options. The thing that pulls this camera’s ratings down, is the company itself. They did a real d*** move. Any accessory that you want has to be Gopro’s, not third party. Now frankly I’m okay with that. But what I’m not okay with is putting the prices up to a ridiculous amount of money. Their Microphone jack adapter, $50. That’s horrible. It’s sad such a good product gets destroyed by a greedy company.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Crow

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in a GoPro, at a better price than Hero 7.
customer_reviews.text: Real deal, not a knock off. GoPro Hero 5 has everything I need. The newer models offer marginally better picture quality, the ability to upload on line directly from the camera, and stream live. The phone app lets you upload on line, so the only compromise is live streaming - and is that really worth spending an extra $300? You’ll need the phone app to get the most out of the camera. It uploads pics and vids quickly and allows you to change camera settings quickly. The battery life is disappointing, just like all GoPros.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not!
customer_reviews.text: The video/pictures are good quality but this is a very fragile item. The 2nd time I opened the charging door it broke off. I guess that's why there are complaints about it being water tight. I didn't think it was a big deal because I didn't intend to take it under water, but I didn't expect it to break. There were absolutely no instructions with the camera so I had to search on the Internet to find one. I just wish I knew how to turn it off without starting the video or taking a picture. I'd probably look for another vendor for this technology except I paid $250 for it and bought other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work past 7m
customer_reviews.text: I took my GoPro scuba diving yesterday at about 6-7m and it wouldn’t turn on... worked a little better when I went to the surface but still inconsistent. This is advertised as way further depths than 6m. I am currently living in Australia so I’m unsure how to get a new one and there is no one to contact to get a refund or new one sent to me. Very disappointed that 300$+ item works so poorly and customer service is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Popular for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This is truly great product. The camera itself, the SW that is downloadable free with it, mobile app and also the smart remote creates a package that fulfills my needs quite completely. My usage is done mostly with motorcycling and available choices with resolutions and frame rates are covering all my use cases. Fifth star is gone for battery life, and especially so when using time lapse mode. For action filming it's sufficient, your hottest action seldom goes on more than two hours but to get nice time lapses you would need more life span - could be done with enhanced SW shutting down the camera in between the time lapse frames...
customer_reviews.author: Tomster

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used this very much yet but I’m impressed so far. We purchased this for a family vacation we’re going on soon so we’ll put it to the test then. After reading the reviews about water infiltration we chose to buy a GoPro Super Suit waterproof case...wouldn’t want to ruin it in the middle of vacation. I’m pleased with the unit’s many features (like voice command), picture quality, portability and ease of use. Even the GoPro software and Quik editing software are really handy and feature rich- especially for the price (free). I’ll update the review if necessary after we get more use out of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: C2H5OH

customer_reviews.title: $100 cheaper than HERO6, with 90 % same features. Mine was DOA
customer_reviews.text: Still relevant! If you don't need 4K 60fps, you'll be fine with the HERO5. Especially for $100 less. The first unit I got was broken, unable to charge. Called GoPro, and they had me organize the return through Amazon. Make sure to CHECK for compatible SD CARDS on the GoPro website. I have 2 x 64 GB cards. You don't need fast cards to record, it only helps if you have hours to transfer on your PC, but even then, it's no big deal. Also I bought a $9 3 battery charger that complements it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew from San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: The last gopro model i can use... so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used GoPro since model 1. Was using a hero4 Silver and it was good, but some issues made me buy this one. One of them is that it kept losing its wifi connection with my cell. Well, hero5 is the last model i can use, because GoPro eliminated the function of making simultaneous video and photos on later models. i was amazed with the audio quality of this one, and the depth of the photos. It really increased its quality. And about the connections, it's all working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ciro Sousa

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is happy
customer_reviews.text: How many times I can repeat the same statement " my daughter is happy" she is 14 and happy! She is a horseback rider, she wanted to record herself on the horse while training and just going on trail rides. Not a single complain, she is happy. I have no idea how this thing works, how good or bad it is quality of produced pictures etc. But I do not care either, because if anything, I mean anything was remotely wrong, I would be informed and pushed into guilt trip and request another camera purchase. None, she is happy. See what I am saying...it is worth the price, person you buy for or even yourself, you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Now you can go pro
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a GoPro product before but I'm totally sold!! this thing is amazing, super compact and really durable, able to go underwater without a housing (the sound quality is better with a housing and your go pro is safer. Would definitely make sure to have some accessories to go with it. Car mounts, helmet mounts, bike mounts, whatever. The quality is amazing and its super user friendly, easy to switch between FPS's and whether you should do 4K or HD. Would definitely recommend a extra batteries and memory cards as this thing is a juice sucker. Over all a super cool camera that can do pretty much everything.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lee

customer_reviews.title: Get the hero 6 black inse
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Was waiting for the cover I ordered to protect it. It was ordered the same time. After reading more reviews I found out the camera is prone to having water leaks. Hence the cheaper price. I made sure to buy the correct cover to.protect it. The gopro cover doesn't work unless you remove the lens cover. Stupid design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HERO5 Session not Black
customer_reviews.text: WATCH OUT!! This appears to be a GoPro HERO5 Session not a Black. I’m returning and hopefully I’ll get a full refund, but just watch out before buying. It’s christmas season so make sure to check out everything you get!!
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Khanna

customer_reviews.title: But this worked just fine. It has great 4k quality
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this last black Friday and didn't open it until several months later. With any other brand I might have been concerned. But this worked just fine. It has great 4k quality. Buttons were a challenge to figure out. But after a few tries it turned out OK. I used it for a river hike, got splashed on and didn't spazz out. You may need additional batteries since it only last 2 hours, and definitely invest in mounting equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D.

customer_reviews.title: Seller having bad return policy
customer_reviews.text: Water just got to my unit charging port even though I was using in a 6 feet pool.. There was not a lot of water but finding water made its way there is bad. Contacted seller and I had to paid for return postage and that was ridiculous. Gopro, what a joke. 10m??? Are you kidding us??
customer_reviews.author: sinaus

customer_reviews.title: It works great and takes amazing videos
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his goPro. It works great and takes amazing videos. When we first received it we could not get the battery to charge. I contacted gopro customer support and they were so nice and helpful. After going through all the steps with them the battery still would not charge. They got me a new battery in the mail and I recieved it in 2 days. That one worked and we have been using the GoPro a lot. I would highly recommend this camera and was very pleased with GoPro support.
customer_reviews.author: Angie McDill

customer_reviews.title: Very poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: horrible sound quality. Poor stabliization. The only good part of this camera is the picture. It records in a nice wide angle so that you can capture everything around you. Dont expect the image to be smooth if you are doing any kind of walking or moving even with the stabilization feature turned on. You sound like you are talking into a glass jar. I have had it for over a year now and the only thing its good for is capturing road footage when I am driving. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: JWang

customer_reviews.title: Great Video / Not recommended if you need good audio...
customer_reviews.text: Great video with lots of options, including being able to use it underwater without additional accessories. The audio however is horrible. I've tried all the audio options (except an external mic), cut the case away from the microphones as others who have the Hero5 have suggested, and nothing helps. It always has a background 'creaking' sound - I did a short video with it on a tripod about 4 feet from me and the audio level was so low it was worthless.
customer_reviews.author: MakeitWrite

customer_reviews.title: Camera doesn't hold the charge even with a new battery replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $214 for this Go Pro and haven't been able to use it yet because it doesn't keep the charge. I call Go Pro and they sent me a new battery, yet it still doesn't keep a charge. I am very disappointed to know that I have spend all of this money for my daughter as a xmas gift and haven't gotten it to work yet. I'm still hoping that someone can help with support for this since it seems like this is a product default or something.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Simione

customer_reviews.title: Trashy products either it was returned or refurbished whatsoever. ...
customer_reviews.text: Trashy products either it was returned or refurbished whatsoever. Bought that cam with Samsung's card and the highest fram rate was 60 where the cam capable up to 120. Didnt gave up right there start thinking maybe its the card i bought a faster card that gopro recommends it for their products still have the same problem vedio are corrupted.
customer_reviews.author: sultan mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: So got it for a motorcycle trip and mounted it on the side of my helmet. Half the video footage is no good since it keeps freezing on and off. I have the highest quality of mini SD card in it and the video still only works half the time. When it does work, it works great. Very clear pic/video quality, but only in 1080p at 60fps. No 4k at 60fps available in this model. Oh, and doesn't come with a protective case that protects the lens, so you'll need to buy that additionally.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: No zoom in/out, only good quality picture in good lighting, so so image stabilization
customer_reviews.text: GoPro got so much positive publicity and I don't understand why. Quality of picture is very good in bright light, but this is the case for any video camera. In poor light, the traditional Cannons that I owned beat it hands down. The lack of smooth zoom in/zoom out is making it effectively unusable. Image stabilization again does not compare to Cannons I owed. Yes, it is small, but what I recorded feels so poor quality. Voice recognition is terribly unreliable. My guess is that it may be necessary type for activities (riding a bike, ...) but for everything else I do not see any use of it.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Battery Issues
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing I could do to make it work or even charge right after unboxing it, so I bought a new battery (Tried several methods before buying a new one and nothing else work out). Several people have had the same issue if you read more comments but luckily with the new battery the camera now works fine. Even though it should've work just fine right from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Melania

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES'S TURN ON ANY MORE
customer_reviews.text: I bought my hero 5 two months ago and I used three times. It's not working anymore. It doesn't turn on or even charge. I need a refund as soon as possible please.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: nice price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Gopro but, I didn't want to buy a $ 500.00 one to take on a motorcycle trip in the mountains of North Carolina. Everything they said was in the the Gopro box. It didn't come in the clear package but that's ok. Came in before they said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cecil Marley Jr

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Adding yet another review about the lack of initial quality. We bought it for a big trip to South America and didn’t bother to open it before leaving (big mistake!). Battery doesn’t sit properly and so won’t charge and now we have a $250 piece of trash in our luggage. My advice: buy this in a store with a good return policy and try it out before you travel.
customer_reviews.author: BrosOnBeats

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: It's like they took my hero 3+ and fixed everything that wasn't perfect. Battery life, WiFi connectivity, screen, image stabilization. .. so much better!
customer_reviews.author: ChallengerRT

customer_reviews.title: We got a dud and now we are stuck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband for father's day. He opened it charged it and was able to use it one time while paddleboarding. Now the thing will not turn on, won't charge or show any signs of life! I can't return it because I bought it early from Amazon and am now out of my return window. Go pro only has a limited window as well. So now I'm out $400 bucks with no working device. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: TikiLife26

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just don't loose it!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift and he ended up taking it with us on our honeymoon. We are divers so it is great for diving (just make sure you have a waterproof case if you are going deep). Well, he lost it somewhere near the Phi Phi islands of Thailand so now the fish are enjoying this beautiful GoPro. I hope someone found it and enjoyed it as much as we did! I made him buy his second GoPro. This is why we can't have nice things.
customer_reviews.author: Linden

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like the insides are going to burn up or something
customer_reviews.text: I use it driving 45 minutes to work. By the time I have it in my hands to put it in the glove box so It’s not in the sun all day, it’s alredy really hot. Makes me feel like the insides are going to burn up or something. Sometimes the voice commands to work on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "waterproof" broke on first day on Galapagos!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was an idiot not to listen to the reviews... Quite arrogant or ignorant of me to think that while so many people warn there are problems with the waterproofing that it won't happen to me. Well it did. Don't buy this camera- you'll regret it. And product support is not helpful at all. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery is no good.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet but when I got it the battery would not charge. So I sent it back and got a replacement. The replacement did exactly the same thing. Obviously the batteries are defective. I went to Wal Mart and bought a battery. It worked.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Creech

customer_reviews.title: Good price but make sure its working as what you paid for..
customer_reviews.text: The packeging is worst and it looks like it was thrown as you can see at pictures, battery life on last for 15 mins. I used 3 times and it is thesame. Wifi app always searching and it is hard to connect. Picture and video quality work fine, as well as the audio. But I think the problem of this gopro is maybe I am not sure if it got beaten up before it was send or while on transit.. as you can see on the pics specially on the clear case the mark of the gopro lens... be the judge...
customer_reviews.author: SPEED

customer_reviews.title: Don't Belive Bad Reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect "out of the box" no issues! Really enjoy it and the quality is great! Several friends have them and not one problem!
customer_reviews.author: Erick P Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Listed as new. Clearly used.
customer_reviews.text: The camera functions fine but was clearly used and not in original packaging. Knock off GoPro box but genuine GoPro camera. Rear screen scratched. No protective film on any part of the camera showing clearly that it was used
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. I found that the images come off ...
customer_reviews.text: Many imitators but GoPro is still the king. I just wish the battery would last just a little longer. Get the floaty handle and make movies all day! Great toy. I found that the images come off GoPro a little dark. If you auto fix the lighting on computer they end up looking really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback is the sensitivity to the voice commands, tend to have to be a little louder than I would like to get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Dadelous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a go pro, what more can I say. These things work great. I’ve had the Chinese knock off’s which do an OK job but once you step into the real deal you won’t regret it. GoPro works perfectly every time and integrates seamlessly with included software. Somehow it picks up really great audio toI.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. All of the products specs are true (limited ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. All of the products specs are true (limited testing) and for its size (battery) 1.5h of 1080 30hz video on one battery is great. Dog in rain (30 mph), in pool (under water hitting other dogs), this 4k capable camera will serve me well for many years
customer_reviews.author: US home buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to complain about
customer_reviews.text: Works, does the job. Good design, small enough where It doesn't feel like I am lugging a big heavy thing around. I bought a tripod for it too. The only bad thing is it didn't come with the mounts for the tripod, but those are cheap to get. Also, it was a little expensive, @$238 which is what I paid for it, however, I use it enough to justify the cost. The video quality is nice, I did some runs with 4k video recording too, and they look great when uploaded to youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Time

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, not so good battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for taking with me while kayak fishing. Love the camera, it takes great video when I can get it located in the right spot. (My problem, not the camera). Came with one battery so I bought a couple of third party batteries for back up and good thing I did as this official battery is the worst of the three. Charging in the camera works but only to about 90% for some reason and then it dies quickly. The cheap batteries have almost double the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: K Cerney

customer_reviews.title: How to make a gopro hater
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not water proof, do not risk it. Brand new 5 minutes is all I got out of it. I've looked and found i'm not the only one. If your product even has a .001% of failure you pull it or change the description, period. I feel betrayed by the brand and I will never buy another GoPro product and I'll do my best to keep my friends away as well. Here I am on my Hawaii vacation with a brand new paperweight. Worst feeling ever.
customer_reviews.author: andrew s.

customer_reviews.title: Total fartbox!!
customer_reviews.text: Audio seldom records. Freezes up often. The only was to clear the menu at times is to remove the battery. Every use is a risk that I may not get my footage. I bought a ton of accessories for this, and wasted a lot of money. Read the other reviews. This thing is a major hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Christmas present for my best friend and she couldn't put it down. The bluetooth capability is key feature because you can film with the camera and see the feed from your phone so that made filming easier, more fun and adding to whatever adventure you are on.
customer_reviews.author: thunderstorm

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing works pretty well. We filmed my daughter’s 5th birthdays party at the science museum with it and i was thrilled with the footage. It is real quality 1080 and if you have final cut or premiere experience you can make some great edits. Although I recently filmed an animal sacrifice in the backyard and noticed some blur. The goat blood looked like it was filmed with a vhs-c camera at best. It was night time and poorly backlit so all around it still did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at capturing those moments, shame about the battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Managed to grab one of these on a treasure truck in NYC. So pleased with it, have used it mountain biking and on vacation in the pool. It’s a great piece of kit and I was so impressed with the output. Only downside is the battery, on highest quality you only get a couple of hours max. Can’t wait to use this skiing with my son.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to seeing all the great footage but it filled up with water
customer_reviews.text: Used it while snorkeling in Micronesia. Looking forward to seeing all the great footage but it filled up with water. All the compartments were closed and checked thoroughly before using but the seals are very flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Derek Collins

customer_reviews.title: It would not even turn on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from the teasure truck, I drove 40mins to get there just to pick up the GoPro. I was so excited to use it for my first sky diving trip, but ran into a big issue. The GoPro would not turn on! I spent hours trying to troubleshoot it, made sure the battery was charged, tried multiple different SD cards as some other mention that a slow card may lock up the camera. End the end I gave up and wasn’t able to use the GoPro for my trip. I just wished it would have work as there are so many videos of people using a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, terrible software causing huge problems
customer_reviews.text: While the camera performs well, the software issues I face with it are unbearable. It has trouble connecting to my PC via GoPro's Quick app, trouble connecting to the GoPro app on my phone, you name it. I'm sure if I signed up for GoPro's paid software I wouldn't be facing issues, but why pay GoPro monthly for access to their advanced software when all I want to do is get my photos onto my own machine? A headache.
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: If you want this camera buy it from an actual store or the official site
customer_reviews.text: It must be a luck of the draw when ordering this camera because when I bought this camera it was almost unuseable. I bought it for an overseas trip and right away the battery barely lasted 1 hour not only that but the battery would beat up almost to the point of being too hot to touch after only a few minutes of being turned on or even while recharging. The camera quality and such were good but because the battery they included with the camera was defective it became near unuseable and it was an extremely dissappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy as I thought I would be...
customer_reviews.text: I’m really just let down by GoPro. Maybe I had high expectations but I feel they need to work out some of the bugs, especially as it relates to external audio and the external audio adapter. It doesn’t work properly with WiFi enabled nor does it allow you to instantly start shooting video. If you’re going to use this with external audio, do your research, or maybe just find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Blane

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, editing functionality needs some work.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice camera and the camera itself takes a beating just fine so it's great for action sports. I wish though the editing features were expanded a bit. I can only do a small amount of editing through my phone (basically 15 second clips). Really you need a nice computer to get some actual good editing in.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I think these cameras are refurbished. I'm having problems with mine. The batteries sure do not last long and I have to remove them when I am not using the camera or it won't work the next time I use it. The housing is very difficult to work with. The voice command does not work well. Unable to update. hard to communicate with the GoPro App (which is poor)I am real disappointed. .
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old camcorder that weighed several pounds and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Appears to be a quality product at a very decent price. A bit pricey but don't leave home without it if you are going on an adventure vacation. Better than the old camcorder that weighed several pounds and had to be held. Mounts to multiple locations, water tight and incredibly light.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Battery defective on Gopro Nova in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought Gopro hero 5 black, it came with a defective battery. I bought Gopro to use on my trip and I could not, Gopro hero 5 black, did not call and did not charge battery. I had to bring in the tecnia assist that identified which battery came with defect. It's absurd for a new machine to come with defect. That was my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. L. Carneiro

customer_reviews.title: I have had many issues with my GoPro. Trying ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had many issues with my GoPro. Trying to get it to work correctly nearly ruined my Disney Trip. After getting a few updates and different memory cards, it seems to work as advertised. But still have little confidence in it as a whole. I'd rather use my phone to record memories at this point.
customer_reviews.author: KWimbish

customer_reviews.title: For MTN biking - Aggressive trails look flat and unimpressive..
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been ok. Not a huge fan on how it perceives depth perception. For MTN biking - pretty aggressive trails look flat and unimpressive. Chest mount helps a bit, but still you could be doing 30 MPH and looks like you are going 3MPH. Steep terrain looks flat and overall flattens everything out.
customer_reviews.author: l!m!t

customer_reviews.title: Room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: The batter goes pretty quick so make sure you have a portable charger or additional battery ready. The door cover that covers the charger port keeps coming off. I’m on m second replacement as a result. The video resolution is great, the picture resolution not so much. Tune sound is great as long as you don’t touch the camera, otherwise you get this muffled scraping microphone sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Boyfriend. He loves it!! Great Picture Quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Taisha-Ann Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. I don't use many of it's features
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I don't use many of it's features. Would have been nice if the image stabilization worked with 1080p @120fps as that's what I typically use as I'm recording RC vehicles that fly by at 40+ mph. With 120fps, it allows you to slow down to 1/8 speed and still remain smooth and clear. This looks really great for when crashes occur.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the Hero5 is waterproof out of the box. I took it to the pool (albeit cautiously) for a trial run and it worked great! Not sure why it didn't work well for some other reviewers. I also liked the image stabiliser and video quality. Only think I found could be improved would be the Quik software used for editing the videos - it only comes with 2 soundtracks, and other soundtracks are only available if you subscribe. =(
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: All around great Video or Still shots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Camera for shooting scenes, landscapes, action, stills, time lapse, underwater (in a waterproof case), lightweight, compact, durable, many accessories, can handle a larger memory card up to 128, has a great app, works with iMovie, Final Cut Pro, GoPro Quick & much more. The price point is excellent for vloggers & influencers or people just wanting to capture moments.
customer_reviews.author: Techie US reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I contacted GoPro tech support and after a little troubleshooting they confirmed the battery was bad. I am extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Go Pros and both batteries were defective! I received this unit in the mail and it would not charge. I ordered a replacement from Amazon which I received very quickly (thank you Amazon). The second unit also had the exact same issue. I contacted GoPro tech support and after a little troubleshooting they confirmed the battery was bad. I am extremely disappointed. Not the level of quality I was expecting at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: David Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but
customer_reviews.text: Connection to my phone even when it was less than 2 inches away kept dropping. The Wireless transfer speed is ungodly painful as well. Video quality was good and pictures came out great. Need to figure out why every time I turned it off the linear shooting mood kept going back to wide-angle which was the whole reason I bought the Hero 5 instead of the cheaper for, to avoid the fish eye look.
customer_reviews.author: Penn_State_HBG_grad_04

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures, but the only problem I have with it is the software is buggy. Occasionally the GoPro will freeze or some settings will disappear that wont be able to be fixed until you reset it. Also I have had a problem with the audio one time where no audio worked during filming and even resetting the device didn't fix the problem. Eventually, a couple hours later, the audio mysteriously started working during videos again. When the camera works, it works well. The bugs in the software need more development though. So far I've had this GoPro approximately two months.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: You’re goina love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s so fun to have a gopro. There’s so many fun attachments you can use with it and it’s awesome to have a camera that you aren’t afraid to get wet. Also love how tiny it is The 4K footage look GREAT, but I personally prefer to use 1080p so I can use the video-stabilization feature For the price this camera is a steal, thanks gopro (and amazon haha)
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The unit is great and super easy to use. Battery life is not long but I will be purchasing the extended battery to make is more usable during my flying (can't get out and change the battery)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great! It has been nice to be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great! It has been nice to be able to take this under water and not have to worry. The screen on the back is a must, so you can doublecheck that everyone you want to be in the pictures and videos are being captured. SO glad we went with the HERO5, as has just enough features to be super helpful but without the price tag of the newer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase from here after comparing prices and reviews. First time trying out gopro and tested for quite sometime about a few months now. I'm amazed by the easy functionality, video quality & durability for such a tiny video camera! Lightweight & super convenience for water sports or travel video recording... Video effect is clear and smooth. Super satisfied & worth the spend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with a GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, I had already have the HERO4, but the 5 is nice upgrade! Being waterproof with the case is an AWESOME feature, they are easy to use, get great video, and all different kinds of mounting options are there! Durability is also pretty incredible for such a lightweight product.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: The best body action cam you can get.
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't want to spend the money but it was worth it to get the GoPro. The GoPro Hero 5 is my favorite model due to the superior sound quality I mean it picks up every type of sound you can imagine. Phenomenal picture and certainly better than cheaper cameras. The app works flawlessly and makes video uploads online a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a little pricey but it does everything in one amazing little package
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to be a hero right? Well you can be a hero too with this Hero5 camera. Maybe a little pricey but it does everything in one amazing little package,its plenty rugged too. There is also some cool software you can use with your phone to view, capture and edit your vids. You know you want one... or maybe another so get it!... This is my 3rd GoPro and the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Horse-N-Round

customer_reviews.title: A Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give this product 4-stars is because it is an ‘older’ technology now. Also, the stabilization is not what it could be. When looking at GoPros, I spent weeks researching the pros and cons of the 5, 6, and 7’s. For the price and capabilities, the GoPro Hero 5 made the most sense. Just from the few recordings I have made so far, I am completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Bochenek

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this gopro non stop. Holidays, birthdays, hiking, parties, road trips, weddings.... etc. My husband and I like to record all kinds of stuff so upgrading our gopro4 to a gopro5 was a must. The picture quality is SO much better and you don't get the scratching sound when switching handlers. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Beeson

customer_reviews.title: Defective product!
customer_reviews.text: It's been five months since I purchased this GoPro and it no longer works. It turns on, starts filming, beeps repeatedly, then turns off. I am unable to review pictures or change the mode from video. Very disappointing, I would not recommend buying from this seller as their products are defective. I am unable to return to GoPro under the one year manufacturer warranty because I didn't purchase it directly from GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, wish it wasn't made in China, but it seems to be very high quality, this is the iPhone of all action cameras - the rest are knockoffs of the original, please buy original to support innovation and money they put into research, do not buy pirated designs.
customer_reviews.author: Marco F

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF. Hero 7 is same camera. Everyone who bought one of there is trying to make GoPro accountable for their defective water seals on the Hero, but all they will do is offer a discount on another defective camera. VERY DISAPPOINTED. DO NOT BUY A GOPRO IF YOU ARE GOING IN THE OCEAN!!!!!!!!!! NO product support
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for airsoft 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Used the camera under extreme conditions such as playing airsoft (with a waterproof case of course). Video quality in 4k was perfect, and the wind noise reduction features worked well. Would recommend you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Yelp Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love. love. love. Took this baby snorkeling all over Hawaii and loved it. Used it hiking too. Grrat quality. easy to use. Short battery life - but I knew that from other reviews so i had a backup battery ready to go. Between the two batteries they lasted the day. Amazing quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mangible

product_meta.title: GoPro Hero5 Black — Waterproof Digital Action Camera for Travel with Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos
product_meta.description:
Style:GoPro| Configuration:w/o GoPro PlusCapture different with Hero5 Black. Share immersive 4K perspectives that make you feel like you’re there. Hero5 Black makes it easy with its one-button simplicity, convenient touch display and ready-to-go waterproof design. Smooth, stabilized video, crystal-clear audio, and pro-quality photo capture combine with voice control and GPS to make Hero5 Black the most impressive GoPro ever. And when it’s time to edit and share, Hero5 Black automatically uploads footage to your GoPro Plus cloud account to provide easy access on any device. Then, create amazing videos automatically with Quick, the GoPro mobile editing app. Your life as you’ve never seen it-Hero5 Black.
Whats Included:
Hero5 Black Camera
The Frame (Hero5 Black)
Rechargeable Battery (Hero5 Black)
Curved Adhesive Mount
Flat Adhesive Mount
Mounting Buckle
USB-C Cable
feature_bullets: Stunning 4k video and 12MP photos in single, burst and time lapse modes charger not included
Durable by design, Hero5 black is waterproof to 33 feet (10 meter) without a housing
Additional GoPro Hero5 black features + benefits below on item page time lapse photo intervals: 05, 1, 2, 5, 10, 30, 60 seconds
Preview and playback your shots, change settings and trim your footage, all on your GoPro
Note: Check user manual on technical specification and instruction video available before use; audio format: wav

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,310 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
